attributes.action: All candidates to get a job interview if they meet the job criteria
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see it made compulsory for employers to interview all candidates whose applications meet the criteria of a person specification for a job.  For decades, most employers have only been shortlisting the 6 or so most experienced candidates.  This is unfair and harsh.  Younger workers are particularly affected by this process of short listing as they have less work experience.  If a candidate has the experience and meets all the job criteria they should be invited to a job interview.

PLEASE SUPPORT MY PETITION
